website_summaries.verdict: Offers a formula and performance that's hard for competitors to beat – silky texture, excellent coverage, quality ingredients, and cruelty-free production. You won't find better mineral makeup on the market today.
pros: Delivers buildable coverage in a pressed powder consumers can feel good about using, thanks to the vegan formula that doesn't include talc or artificial ingredients and isn't tested on animals
cons: Color matching to your skin tone is difficult because the shades run light
The downside of the impressive coverage is the tendency to cake if you apply too much

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Coverage!
customer_reviews.text: I'm Asian with a fairly light complexion so from other Asian's recommendation on here, I purchased Warm 2. I suffer from mild skin inflammation where sections of my face turns red. I got tired of wearing a concealer then using a powder afterwards so I thought I'd give this product a try and I'm very glad I did. It provides remarkable coverage on its own. The photos speak for themselves. I have not doctored these pictures in any way, other than cut and put them in a collage. Top pictures are of before and bottom, after. I would recommend that you get a lighter (or darker) shade to give it some contoured look. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Hannah T

customer_reviews.title: Accurate color, clean, light coverage
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with this product. I would normally never buy make up I couldn't try the color of first but I was out and only buy "clean" makeup. Description was accurate for olive skin. It matches my skin exactly. I would say that it lightly evens skin tone. Don't expect it to have a heavy cover up. I prefer that type of makeup. I have it applied over a lotion base with nothing else. I choose to lightly roll a buki brush on the compact to apply because it will last much longer. Costs significantly less than in my local coop.
customer_reviews.author: Wholehealthcaboodle

customer_reviews.title: Give it time
customer_reviews.text: Happy to find an Olive tint. It is very fair, I will order the next shade darker next time. It leaves a chalky appearance at first, but don't worry, once it settles it has a lovely finish and blush and bronzer goes on seamlessly. I will apply a light moisturizer first, the next time that I put it on. Coverage builds nicely, I have hyperpigmentation and it does a nice job of covering without looking cakey.
customer_reviews.author: KDM

customer_reviews.title: My favorite for sensitive, acne prone skin!
customer_reviews.text: I love this make up. I use this powder because it is rated well on EWG, I have very sensitive, acne-prone skin and after a year, I have not found this make up to be irritating. It's got great coverage, lightweight and the colors are awesome. I tried mine in the store at Whole Foods. If you have olive skin and don't want the pinkish look, Warm 2 is a great color! I wear this with the Berry Glow 3 in 1 Color Stick on my cheeks and lips and I'm good to go!
customer_reviews.author: mgles

customer_reviews.title: I love the product but the colors are misleading
customer_reviews.text: I ended up having to order the pressed powder twice because after visiting their website and seeing which shade description matched my skin tone the best (neutral 2), it arrived and was incredibly pale. Not as described on their website at all. I then ordered Warm 3 and it is a much better match although I feel like summer I may have to purchase another shade as well. Whatever shade you choose I might suggest you go a tone darker. I have normal skin that tans in the summers and then I lose the tan in the winter and I have red undertones.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Great foundation! A must have!
customer_reviews.text: Not bad, and natural. This is a staple in my makeup bag now... After my last pregnancy i somehow had a weirf reaction to all of my makeup... so I now only use natural products and others for sensitive skin, this works flawlessly. I use Juice beauty liquid foundation and apply one layer of this and I have coverage that lasts 8 hours with no touch up.
customer_reviews.author: AllisonKandii

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for green undertone complexions!
customer_reviews.text: Mineral Fusion is the only line of foundation that matches my olive/green undertone complexion nearly spot on. I am half Puerto Rican and half Irish with skin on the darker side of the spectrum. After wasting thousands of dollars over the years, this is the only foundation I will ever buy. Not only does it match my skin tone, but it is nontoxic to your skin. It will not cause acne,irritation, clogged pores. None of that. In fact, it will actually heal your skin. As long as they do not change their formula, I will continue using this foundation.
customer_reviews.author: Esme

customer_reviews.title: Yeahh!
customer_reviews.text: I've never used this product or brand before and I was a little nervous bc I ordered it wo color matching (being a brown woman that can b a disaster, I usually use brands made for women of color). But, guess what?! It matched my skin perfectly. Also, I've always used a liquid foundation, so this was a bit of a switch up but this looked glowy and nice on me. I'm so happy to find a product that nurtures my skin and makes it look good. I'm pleased.
customer_reviews.author: jaderunner

customer_reviews.title: Perfect buildable coverage
customer_reviews.text: I just love this powder! It has good coverage. If you put it on with a brush, it has a medium coverage & looks natural. But if you use a power puff/pad to apply it, it really covers very well! I don’t even need to wear foundation under this. It covers acne & scars with just the powder alone! Color is perfect for my very pale skin. If you go to Whole Foods you can sample the colors before purchasing.
customer_reviews.author: DogLvr💜

customer_reviews.title: love this!
customer_reviews.text: This is the first time I am buying powder foundation again and will keep using it from now on. I usually switch products so much in an attempt to find a good foundation but this one is it! I apply it with a compact brush and that gives me really good coverage. My skin has calmed down too since its sensitive and usually breaks out easily.
customer_reviews.author: Louise

customer_reviews.title: It is okay
customer_reviews.text: I bought this looking for a non toxic foundation. Here's the thing, of you are looking for something just a little heavier than powder, then you will like this product. If you are expecting it to wear like a regular foundation, you will be disappointed. It doesn't really cover much in way of imperfections but, it does give a little smoother canvas. I plan on trying a light coverage foundation under it to see if I can use it that way.
customer_reviews.author: b shows

customer_reviews.title: Very Good Powder!
customer_reviews.text: This has great coverage and the cool 2 is a perfect match for my skin. It doesn't come in any darker shades for the cool colors, which come this summer I will need, so that's a bummer. I've always used a loose mineral powder and wasn't sure how I would like this, but I actually like it better than loose powder, much easier to keep it contained and to travel with. I also like the fact it's not perfumed. No smell at all that I can tell.
customer_reviews.author: Alaska Garden Girl

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing!!!! No eye or skin irritation and it's smooth and stays on all day. When I get home it looks the same as it did in the morning. It's crazy! The first cosmetic that I have used that doesn't make my eyes itch and burn. I forget I'm wearing it. Prior to this, I gave up and hadn't worn makeup for about 6 years. When I did for special occasions, it would drive me nuts.
customer_reviews.author: MG

customer_reviews.title: Good stuff - Natural
customer_reviews.text: Good face powder - I don't use a foundation, just this over my lotion. Works well, no scent, but it's usually faded by the end of the day. Never had a breakout from it - easy on the skin : )
customer_reviews.author: Lilian

customer_reviews.title: Just as good as bare minerals & MAC but much cheaper
customer_reviews.text: For those of you ladies who are used to using expensive foundation powders such as Mac & bare minerals given that they work much better than cheaper department store products such as L’Oréal but don’t want to pay the expensive prices for MAC & BM products, this is the next best thing that is much cheaper... this product has no scent, the coverage is just as good as MAC & BM, it’s easy to wash off, and it lasts just as long... I absolutely love it and the value for the money is 100% incredible... only thing that it doesn’t come with is the applicator but I can live with that since I use make up brushes
customer_reviews.author: Jackie

customer_reviews.title: Not for me
customer_reviews.text: This cakes on my face in a weird way and doesn’t look natural at all. I bought this one and the BareMinerals version and that one looks much better. Also, this doesn’t include an applicator (the BareMinerals one does). It seems like this type of compacted powder which requires more coverage than something like a bronzer or blush) would need more than a brush for application.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Just okay
customer_reviews.text: I'm on a mission to try every mineral powder. I love the idea of the compact but I don't find that this powder is as refined as the loose powders. It breaks up in the middle of the day as oil starts to mix with it. I also don't find that I have that issue with loose powders. I'll keep using this as a backup in my purse for touch ups but I won't be replacing my IQ Naturals or Bare Minerals as my overall foundation.
customer_reviews.author: LeahC

customer_reviews.title: Cool 1 is really pink
customer_reviews.text: I'm not sure if the coloring has changed since I last bought this a couple years ago but the Cool 1 I just ordered is way pinker than what I had before. It turns my face darker/pinker so that it doesn't match my neck! Other than that, I love the way this looks/feels and how it breaks me out the least of any foundations I've tried
customer_reviews.author: Portlander

customer_reviews.title: Great coverage
customer_reviews.text: I am very lucky to have picked the correct color from the chart listed here. I have fair skin, lightly freckled ( Irish) and this covers well by only using a very small amount. It's light cover is sufficient for a natural look. I am always looking for a product that is healthy as well as superior coverage and this is both. A bit pricey, but a little goes a long way and so I'm giving this powder 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fail
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted to love this product because I love the concealer. However, this powder magnifies every wrinkle or dry flake of skin on my face. It should go on smooth for the price. The cheap stuff does 100% better job than this product.
customer_reviews.author: Patient 957

customer_reviews.title: Love this!
customer_reviews.text: I really love the glow this mineral foundation gives my skin. It covers well, not too heavy, not too light. I have skin more on the dry side so I was worried about a powder foundation drying out my skin. The last powder foundation I had drew attention to fine lines but this one covers well. I also have very sensitive skin but I have no problems with this. I am very happy with this product!!
customer_reviews.author: Tarryn Hoff

customer_reviews.title: I love this brand
customer_reviews.text: I did quite a bit of research on natural product cosmetics and have tried a few different brands. Mineral Fusion is by far the best! I have several things from their product line and everything I've purchased has been great! The pressed foundation covers really well without leaving a powdery effect. I use this under the bronzer and it works great!
customer_reviews.author: Brianne

customer_reviews.title: Still seeking the perfect mineral foundation
customer_reviews.text: Light coverage, easy to wear. It doesn't feel cakey or heavy. I wish it provided more coverage especially in the winter months, but it's easy to apply and fine for more casual summer days. It looks best applied over a light moisturizer. I had been using a mineral foundation for more than 20 years and once the company was sold all of the formulas were changed. I am still seeking something that resembles that original formula.
customer_reviews.author: ganendal

customer_reviews.title: Love love love
customer_reviews.text: I am so glad I found this product. I’ve tried all kinds of powder foundations that all sink into fine lines or fade away completely. This has staying power. I don’t even need to use concealer with it. I am able to build the coverage where I need a little extra, and it makes skin appear luminous. I’m 38 and have crows feet, etc, but this makes me look airbrushed. Will keep repurchasing.
customer_reviews.author: abigorangehat

customer_reviews.title: and another that she thought the coverage was much better than Bare Minerals
customer_reviews.text: I've been using Bare Minerals for years and since switching to this friends have commented on how glowing my skin seems; and another that she thought the coverage was much better than Bare Minerals.
customer_reviews.author: E. Riordan

customer_reviews.title: Pretty awesome!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great foundation and provides pretty decent coverage. I have rosacea, so my skin is red and sometimes patchy, and I needed something that would give me coverage, but didn’t wasn’tto go with liquid foundation, because it tends to make me break out even more. My only complaint is that it is not lasting. If wearing all day, I have to reapply more than once. Try buying a kabuki brush for application; they work well together.
customer_reviews.author: SB

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product! However, Amazon’s delivery noted that it “was handed directly to the resident” which was not true at all (I live alone) I found it dumped on my front steps leading up to my house when I got home. Amazon, at least have your drivers keep it honest!
customer_reviews.author: Courtney Eagle

customer_reviews.title: Best I've Tried
customer_reviews.text: I have very oily skin and I'll be honest this isnt the greatest for that. However, I haven't found anything that is and is also safe and free of harmful chemicals. All in all I'm happy with this purchase, good match to my skin tone, doesnt break me out, buildable coverage, hides imperfections. If you're very oily I would recommend primer.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Has great coverage , looks great all day, the pictures show me wearing this I'm the red head in front
customer_reviews.author: Tammy R.

customer_reviews.title: Great as a setting powder
customer_reviews.text: I use this as a setting powder and I'm well pleased. I didn't feel it had enough coverage to be a true foundation as I have acne scarring. One sweep over blush and bronzed areas and it blends them softly for a glowing look. I recommend as a compact.
customer_reviews.author: C

customer_reviews.title: Covered my rosacea!
customer_reviews.text: This is the most amazing mineral makeup out there. I have severe redness from rosacea and this covered it completely and isn't cakey!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Bondeson

customer_reviews.title: Terrible and impossible to contact seller. Need different return option.
customer_reviews.text: The powder dissipates when I use my brush to try to apply it to my face. I am trying to return it but I can only use UPS and I live in a small town where the only 2 UPS drop off places are closed because they are non essential stores. I can’t find a contact seller icon to try to have them let me use the US post office. I bought 2 of these and now I am just out almost $40. Very frustrating.
customer_reviews.author: lucky

customer_reviews.title: Couldn't find a match. Color on box not color of product
customer_reviews.text: I tried 4 colors. Olive 1, Olive 2, Warm 1 and Warm 2. They were all way too light. I didn't feel the color description matched the actual product or the color swatch on the side of the boxes. They were all actually much lighter. Normally I wear medium 3 in Cover Girl (which isn't a perfect match for my skin because it's a little dark for the lower half of my face) after reading reviews and looking at pictures I thought at least one of them would be a match. Sadly, Im returning all 4. I don't know if I'll try again. Image is if warm 2.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer hittson

customer_reviews.title: Excellent. Go for it.
customer_reviews.text: Great product for the low price. Doesn't come with an applicator thought. You can use brush or s sponge. I am Indian female and my skin tone is towards a fairer scale. Earlier I used Sephora Peach Fawn compact power for regular office use. This shade, Olive 2 exactly matches not only with my skin but also feels very soft and natural. It also match with Sephora Peach Fawn and is definitely cheaper than what I used earlier.
customer_reviews.author: Vrinda Gote

customer_reviews.title: Great coverage, but...
customer_reviews.text: Great coverage except on my nose which gets oily by the end of the morning. When my face is oily, the makeup wipes off easily, leaving weird streaks on my face. Coverage everywhere else doesn’t budge the whole day though, and I liked that I didn’t have to use a lot to cover up my face. That said, I was very surprised that after only a month of using this, I’m already seeing the metal bottom of the tray. I’d read other reviews raving that this lasted them at least a few months. I might get this again when my shade is discounted, but otherwise wouldn’t get it again at full price for how short it’s lasted.
customer_reviews.author: IT

customer_reviews.title: Favorite Pressed Powder
customer_reviews.text: This is my absolute favorite pressed power. You dont need much to get great coverage, and once it is on you dont notice it at all. I am pretty minimalist when it comes to makeup and between a light SPF this is the only thing I wear to work everyday. It does not seem to clog my pores, and is easy to wash off at the end of the day.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not the description color
customer_reviews.text: Ordered Mineral Fuson ( Olive 2 ). Definitely not for Olive colored skin as described. I should of ordered ( Olive 3 ), because in the description it look's like it's for my complexion, but definitely " not " !
customer_reviews.author: Chloe

customer_reviews.title: Eh
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to love this product but having acne and needing full coverage to cover it up is a must. I felt like even after I applied my concealer and then this powder, I still needed to apply more. It wasn't enough to get that full coverage finish. You have to apply several coats and then it still seems like it's not sufficient enough. It's okay, but there's better products out there..
customer_reviews.author: Kris

customer_reviews.title: Too light..can't use this color
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the warm 1 color and it is much to light. I purchased right before an extended trip the end of august and have now missed the return window. It appears to cover well but makes my face to pasty white.
customer_reviews.author: Stefeman1

customer_reviews.title: Great for buildable coverage or as a setting powder
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been using this on the recommendation of a Facebook friend for about 2 years. I love to use it during the summer months as a lightweight option to cover imperfections. I use it the rest of the year as a setting powder over my regular foundation. It does not have a noticeable scent and has buildable coverage. My only complaint is there is not enough shade variety but otherwise, I really like it.
customer_reviews.author: Kcuret

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: Have fallen in love with no mineral fusion products. I have rosacea and dry skin, and their products have totally tranforned my skin- really. I put this powder over their BB and am good to go. Will say I use oil as a moisturizer with this. Not sure if it make a difference or not.
customer_reviews.author: akrba

customer_reviews.title: Not Good for Sensitive Skin
customer_reviews.text: I purchase this item because I have extremely sensitive skin. Unfortunately, it's caused me to break out in an itchy rash. The packaging, however, is beautiful, and it's a good amount of foundation for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Jaime Hillegonds

customer_reviews.title: but i like a semi matte look
customer_reviews.text: I have dry skin, but i like a semi matte look. This works beautifully with my moisturizer, I get the finish love WITHOUT it accenting any lines or wrinkles or looking cakey. For a more polished look I use it with foundations and get a flawless finish. I use both Olive 2 & 3, depending on the season. This is worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: Vero

customer_reviews.title: Terrible shade of olive- more like white shell
customer_reviews.text: The shade shown on the picture is different than how it goes on My face looks so white I can't use it Too much money for an unpredictable color match with my skin Can I return it
customer_reviews.author: Betty

customer_reviews.title: Color Off !!
customer_reviews.text: The color of the foundation is nothing like the color shown. It is not a warm medium color. It is a cool very pale color that I cannot wear. It looks like kabuki paint on my face! I have never had a foundation color so far off so it is not usable. You would have to be an extremely pale person with almost white skin to wear this. I am very disappointed. It was the Warm 1 color which says for medium skin.
customer_reviews.author: Jean Bowen

customer_reviews.title: Extremely Light Color
customer_reviews.text: I purchased Warm 3. I have light to medium skin, dirty blonde hair, and blue eyes. This color is very light. Using this foundation, my face looks a lot more pale then the remainder of my body. I like that the product is a natural solution to wearing foundation.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany Crocker

customer_reviews.title: Perfect powder at a great price!
customer_reviews.text: This is a lightweight pressed powder that goes on easily and provides great coverage without the feel of heavy foundation. I would definitely recommend and would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Jill

customer_reviews.title: Great ingredients for pregnant mamas!
customer_reviews.text: I got this product due to its ingredients since I am pregnant. I really like the coverage and blendability but I do notice when I’ve worn it a few hours my nose area looks a bit splotchy. It may just be a result from sweating/wear but it’s not a deal breaker. I would definitely buy this product again!
customer_reviews.author: Misa L.

customer_reviews.title: Too light and matte for me..
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to like this product because it is less than half the price of my usual powder makeup (La Bella Donna). However, it really wasn't for me. I ordered the neutral 2 shade and it was really light & pretty chalky looking. It was more like a "fair" color. It just looked too matte for me. If you like totally matte look, you might like it but order a darker shade than you think you will need.
customer_reviews.author: Greg Markey

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: I love that it is approved by EWG and I feel good about putting this product on my face. I was hoping to like this better than Bare Minerals, but unfortunately I think Bare Minerals provides better coverage. This is still a very good product and I will continue to use it!
customer_reviews.author: PB2525

customer_reviews.title: Returned and got a freaking code! No Label
customer_reviews.text: I like the product but I HATE the return code that has to be scanned, let me get a label please so I can return this. We are unable to scan here at the small town I live in. Once I get the label I will update the product review.
customer_reviews.author: TDailey

customer_reviews.title: Warning - used product
customer_reviews.text: I received a used product covered with powder and holes from whoever used and returned it. So much for “making beauty healthy”. I will say, the shade seems like a perfect match and I love that it’s vegan/fragrance free, but I will not be putting this on my face.
customer_reviews.author: Paige

customer_reviews.title: I highly recommend this.
customer_reviews.text: This is wonderful makeup. I've been using it for several years. Before I tried this brand I was using Bare Minerals. I have allergies and very sensitive skin, but this causes no reaction of any kind. It covers my rosacea and scars. I am thankful to have found it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I like this product, I apply it with a brush or spot treatment with a sponge. It always looks very natural and it makes me feel great that the powder is made without chemicals . It removes easily which is great for the end of the day , I occasionally reapply during the middle of the day after meals
customer_reviews.author: Dee

customer_reviews.title: Great stuff, especially for Celiacs sufferers.
customer_reviews.text: A great solution for those of us who need a gluten free powder. Also - and essential - cruelty free. The color remains true throughout the day and does not irritate my skin. Since I prefer a loose-power foundation, I simply use a --very-- clean knife to scrape the powder out of the compact and into a --very-- clean jar, and apply with a --very-- clean foundation brush that I wash weekly. Medium coverage.
customer_reviews.author: Pax Deo

customer_reviews.title: The only foundation I use
customer_reviews.text: This is the only foundation I use. I've been using it since 2008. At first I was hesitant to use a powder, as I was stuck on liquid due to my dry skin. But this foundation won't cake your skin or make you look dry. I use it sparingly for occasional cover up and when I go out in the sun, as it has SPF and provides coverage for damage. I am pleased that this is a vegan product. Overall, it is perfect for light coverage for blemishes and provides an even, tone look.
customer_reviews.author: sronfloyd

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Skintone Match
customer_reviews.text: Love this powder- my 4th one! Never fails to look good, medium coverage, long wear and perfect for sensitive acne prone skin. I like getting it from amazon Bc it’s much cheaper than whole foods
customer_reviews.author: Julia

customer_reviews.title: she looked amazing. It does not give me the same coverage
customer_reviews.text: I bought this after seeing it on my friend, she looked amazing. It does not give me the same coverage. It also wipes off easily, each time I've worn it, if I touch my nose at all it's very visible. I would suggest to spend a little more for Younique or Tarte, both of their products have good coverage, are natural, and don't rub off.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Disney

customer_reviews.title: Mineral Fusion
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this. Light to medium coverage, lightweight, cleaner ingredients and quick application. Much better than regular foundation in my opinion. Never looks cakey when buffing it in with a dense brush.
customer_reviews.author: Crys

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with this product
customer_reviews.text: I am happy with quality of this product. The coverage is much better than I expected, and no irritation on my skin like some other big name mineral powder I used before this one. I checked brand web site to find out color matching, but it is guessing game.
customer_reviews.author: Cam Island

customer_reviews.title: Very Impressed
customer_reviews.text: I was very surprised by this foundation! I was a long time user of Estée Lauder pressed powder, but was looking for a cleaner option. The compact lasted me 2 months of daily wear, and it has an easily buildable coverage that looks very natural. I will be using this from now on!
customer_reviews.author: ArielR

customer_reviews.title: This is my favorite powder! I have been using it for over ...
customer_reviews.text: This is my favorite powder! I have been using it for over a year. I have switched over all my make up and nail polish and only use Mineral Fusion products. Highly suggest them! And Amazon has this powder for a fraction of the price that whole foods does.
customer_reviews.author: Kristina

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: I like that it makes feels like I dont have anything on. Does work for all day coverage.
customer_reviews.author: ATD

customer_reviews.text: Blends easily on the skin and looks very natural. Fades through the day, but diesnt leave stark lines. Nice slim packaging too! So much better than the compact foundation I grew up using.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Morrison

customer_reviews.title: Best powder for 22 bucks!! No talc or chemicals!!
customer_reviews.text: So I normally don't write reviews cuz I am lazy but this powder is amazing!!! No talc or anything bad in it!! I use it over my foundation stick. Will buy more in the future ;))) I am very fair skin and I got the Calm 1
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Matches skin tone
customer_reviews.text: Normally I use powder and foundation that are separate but thought I'd try this. Color matches my skin tone perfectly and looks very natural. Would like it to last me longer with it being a bit more expensive than other brands, but still good overall.
customer_reviews.author: Heather Reyburn

customer_reviews.title: Not for redheads / fair skinned
customer_reviews.text: Color was too red/orange for my fair skin tone. (Redhead) however it was lightweight to apply and was comparable to other products I’ve used; I just won’t be buying again since they’ve missed the mark on fitting their shades to redheads/ fair skinned.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight, excellent coverage.
customer_reviews.text: I love the coverage of this powder, and it doesn’t settle into pores or fine lines. I use it to set my foundation and I absolutely love that it gives me a little bit more coverage beyond my concealer. This is the second time I’ve purchased this product, and I was really happy to find it on Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Julie H.

customer_reviews.title: Great powder for sensitive skin
customer_reviews.text: I first bought this product at Sprouts, and absolutely love it. I just purchased a replacement, as the one I bought lasted me about 6 months! (I don't use that much powder.) I break out easily, but this product has not given me any acne. I'm very pleased with it.
customer_reviews.author: Bunny

customer_reviews.title: My favorite foundation!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I love love love this foundation. It goes on easily, looks smooth/even, and doesn’t look orange at all. I like a natural look, and this is my go to product!! Plus, one lasts me 2-3 months. Great value for an all-natural cosmetic product!
customer_reviews.author: Alllyson Stiles

customer_reviews.title: Good to layer
customer_reviews.text: I use this on top of the foundation, feels less shiny and more blended. I can reapply throughout my day. Feels light, but looks balanced.
customer_reviews.author: Chelbel

customer_reviews.title: but does a good job covering up imperfections and doesnt cause my sensitive ...
customer_reviews.text: Much much lighter then I expected, but does a good job covering up imperfections and doesnt cause my sensitive skin to become irritated. I think I'll buy again in a darker color.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love this stuff
customer_reviews.text: Love this stuff. Not cheap but looks great, I literally can't tell when it's on my face it's so light, and these have lasted me one per year for the last three years. They stopped selling my skin tone (beige 1 I think? The pastiest color available) at my local place so I'm buying online now.
customer_reviews.author: Estu

customer_reviews.title: Will order again
customer_reviews.text: I finally retired and wanted something less sticky for a foundation. Nice and light powder while covering just enough.
customer_reviews.author: PS

customer_reviews.title: Best applied with a kabuki brush
customer_reviews.text: My HG mineral powder foundation! Light to full coverage, breathable and never breaks me out! Best applied with a kabuki brush, like my fave from ELF.
customer_reviews.author: electrocat

customer_reviews.title: New favorite powder foundation
customer_reviews.text: First time trying this product & brand. I ordered this in January and still have about half the container left. I picked a color at the store and then ordered it here where it's about $10-12 cheaper. I wear it daily, but don't wear make up on the weekends sometimes. I do recommend not applying too many layers, as it can get cakey, but it works well for light coverage and EWG verified!
customer_reviews.author: P B

customer_reviews.title: New favorite mineral foundation!
customer_reviews.text: I've been on the hunt for a natural foundation for the longest time. I've tried numerous organic and natural brands over the last few years and this is the best coverage and makes my skin feel so soft. Doesn't irritate it or cause me to break out. Love that it's in a compact and not a loose mineral foundation. Great for on the go. Will be purchasing again and again!
customer_reviews.author: Ahenderson

customer_reviews.title: Good shade selections at a good price.
customer_reviews.text: Looks nice; doesn’t look cakey. I put it on with a flat top kibuki brush. Good price. Good shade selections. Great Amazon discovery!
customer_reviews.author: Cassandra M. Alls

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic! Good coverage, even without concealer. But better with concealer(I just use my BareMinerals concealer, when not feeling lazy.)
customer_reviews.author: Zoya Raysberg

customer_reviews.title: best powder i've found thus far
customer_reviews.text: this powder is so great for so many reasons. it doesn't have all the scary chemicals of its cousins. it layers well so you can control if you'd like light or heavy coverage. it doesn't make me break out. it's a slim, flat compact, not bulbous or oversized, and best of all, it has a mirror in it! too many companies focus on the clear window for the packaging or whatever and lose sight of what the consumer needs... sight. if it made coffee i'd marry it.
customer_reviews.author: anna

customer_reviews.title: Great for everyday!
customer_reviews.text: I don’t normally buy makeup online, so this was a risk. But it’s awesome! Love that it is good for my skin. Doesn’t break me out. This is light coverage. I use a dense brush to apply, and it looks very skin-like. I ordered the lighter olive shade, and it’s perfect!!
customer_reviews.author: CB

customer_reviews.title: Too Chalky/Cakey
customer_reviews.text: Cakes easily and sticks to dry spots, moisturizer or not. Extremely heavy with only medium coverage.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. Mama Bear 🌺❤️

customer_reviews.title: Pretty nice!
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice powder, although it does not have the staying power I was hoping for. It does need to be applied throughout the day, and the coverage is not as good as I had hoped. I'm still very happy with the ingredients, and the texture as well. It does have a slight fragrance, but nothing too bothersome. All in all, I would recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Valerie Edwards

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful product
customer_reviews.text: helps with breakouts because of the minerals and it covers very nicely and natural looking
customer_reviews.author: Blanca Diosa

customer_reviews.title: Regardless of feeling skeptical I was very pleased the shade matched me perfectly
customer_reviews.text: I tried this shade at Whole Foods before ordering it online. I was skeptical ordering this product because the shade looked much lighter than what I remember seeing at Whole Foods. Regardless of feeling skeptical I was very pleased the shade matched me perfectly. I love that it gives me a natural coverage and feels very light...as if I'm not wearing any foundation. I recommend this product to anyone that's looking for good coverage without feeling like you are wearing a foundation.
customer_reviews.author: QueenW

customer_reviews.title: Ok substitute until I can pick up my custom foundation
customer_reviews.text: Decent powder foundation if you have cool-toned but dusky, fair skin. Too dark if you’re a natural strawberry-blonde who NEVER tans.
customer_reviews.author: L

customer_reviews.title: Good product. Good price.
customer_reviews.text: Love the look and clean feel of this product. Price is much better online.
customer_reviews.author: martie buzzard

customer_reviews.title: I returned it .....
customer_reviews.text: I have bought this product 3 times and I returned it because it haven't found the correct "color" for my face. It is too light.
customer_reviews.author: yose

customer_reviews.title: I feel like it applies evenly and easily
customer_reviews.text: I usually only put this on once a day. I feel like it applies evenly and easily. I am a trainer so I do a lot of moving throughout the day, but still want to put on some light makeup to look professional. This really fits the bill. I don't feel like I need to reapply unless I get more sweaty than usual and have to wipe my face.
customer_reviews.author: Happy Mom of 2

customer_reviews.title: Good Pressed Foundation, but Colors are Deceiving.
customer_reviews.text: Nice but color in picture doesn't do it justice. I initially bought the olive 1. It was too light for my med-olive skin. I then bought the olive 2. The pictures show a big difference between the two shades. I found that in reality there was little difference. The powder works well but I am not going to keep trying for the right shade. I gave them to my daughters.
customer_reviews.author: PattyCake

customer_reviews.title: Love this product!
customer_reviews.text: Love this light weight powder foundation. Very natural looking with great coverage. I use a lighter color and then use a bronzer if necessary.
customer_reviews.author: mon

customer_reviews.title: Looks natural
customer_reviews.text: Love the coverage of this product. Looks natural and I matched the color the first try.
customer_reviews.author: colleen b

customer_reviews.title: Very Full Coverage Powder Foundation
customer_reviews.text: This is a must try if you use powder foundations. It is very full coverage. I love the fact that it has natural ingredients that are good for your skin. I have acne prone skin and this foundation really helps. My face doesn't get near as oily when I use this.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: To light
customer_reviews.text: It covered pretty good.But I will try something different next time.It was to light.
customer_reviews.author: Joy Goodin

customer_reviews.title: Smooth and even and great for sensitive skin
customer_reviews.text: I have used this exclusively for 5 years. I love it. Goes on smooth and even and lasts all day. I have very sensitive skin and have had no problems with this product.
customer_reviews.author: sarah

customer_reviews.title: Natural and covers well.
customer_reviews.text: I usually purchase this at Whole Foods where it is slightly more expensive. It is a natural product that covers well so I can feel good about wearing it all day. It’s great that it is delivered right to my door.
customer_reviews.author: Janell

customer_reviews.title: Such a perfect match to my skin tone and really wonderful coverage ...
customer_reviews.text: This foundation is a game changer. Such a perfect match to my skin tone and really wonderful coverage without feeling caky. Not so matte that I look like i'm wearing makeup. Perfect balance of sheen and matte. Love this foundation.
customer_reviews.author: minimalist.mom

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: Wish I could give it 5 stars but it tends to break me out just a bit. I'm older so need more moisture, maybe less drying.
customer_reviews.author: Diane L Shields

customer_reviews.title: Amazing line and it’s gluten free
customer_reviews.text: I have a very sensitive skin and this is the only powder that doesn’t dry out my skin. Love it ! Purchased all my make up from them
customer_reviews.author: Yana

customer_reviews.title: Paraben free !!! And  nourishing botanicals
customer_reviews.text: I like this powder because it goes on easy last all day and the number one reason why I use mineral fusion it’s paraben free all the other powders out there have so much bad stuff in them !! I’ve been using this and other mineral fusion powder s for over a year now and I’m very happy it’s price is a little high but I feel it’s worth it
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

product_meta.title: Mineral Fusion Pressed Powder Foundation, Warm 2
product_meta.description:
Color:Warm 2

Preserve your naturally glowing complexion with the Mineral Fusion Pressed Powder Foundation!

With a powerful blend of antioxidants that includes white tea, red tea, pomegranate, vitamin C, and vitamin E, this foundation fights damage from free radicals in order to create healthier skin, making it an age-defying solution to the unwanted appearance of fine lines. It features silky, triple-milled minerals that provide flawless coverage by smoothening the skin tone and concealing lines and pores.

Unlike other pressed powders that use chemicals for their products, Mineral Fusion only uses pure and non-toxic ingredients from skin-soothing botanicals and minerals. It is certified 100% vegan, gluten-free, cruelty-free, paraben-free, artificial color-free, fragrance-free, talc-free, and hypoallergenic.

This Pressed Powder Foundation by Mineral Fusion is formulated with only the safest and gentlest ingredients, making it suitable even for use on sensitive skin. It contains natural UV-protection minerals as well as skin-soothing ingredients like licorice root, aloe vera, and cucumber.

Additionally, this pressed powder comes in the Warm 2 shade which is great for medium skin with golden undertones. You can use it anytime and anywhere, as it is easy to apply and convenient to bring wherever you go.

Mineral Fusion offers a vast array of items that cater to hair care, skin care, cosmetics, nail care, and body care, each offering the natural benefits of minerals. These products are manufactured in the U.S., and their high quality is guaranteed.

Ingredients : Mica, Lauroyl Lysine, Zinc Stearate, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Titanium Dioxide, Zinc Oxide, Boron Nitride, Ascorbyl Palmitate (Vitamin C), Hydrolyzed Mango Juice Extract, Hydrolyzed Garcinia Mangostana (Mangosteen) Fruit Extract, Camellia Sinensis (White Tea) Leaf Extract, Alaria Esculenta (Sea Kelp) Extract, Aspalathus Linearis (Rooibus Red Tea) Leaf Extract, Glycrrhiza Glabra (Licorice) Root Extract, Punica Granatum (Pomegranate) Seed Extract, Aloe Barbadensis (Aloe Vera) Extract, Cucumis Sativus (Cucumber) Fruit Extract, Tocopherol Acetate (Vitamin E), Sambucus Nigra Fruit (Elderberry), Phenoxyethanol. Sweep the brush across pressed mineral powder and tap off excess. Blend onto face in light layers until desired coverage is achieved.
feature_bullets: PRESSED POWDER FOUNDATION: Our Pressed Powder Foundation is triple-milled for a smooth finish that airbrushes pores. Buildable coverage means total flexibility—all while staying shine-free & photo-ready.

NATURAL FORMULA: Our age-defying, skin-soothing pressed powder is made with Pomegranate, White Tea, Red Tea, & Sea Kelp to illuminate your natural glow while reducing the appearance of free radical damage.

SMARTER MAKEUP: Improve your complexion & nourish your skin with our line of lip tints, eyeshadows, brushes, foundations, nail polishes, mascaras, primers, eyeliners, moisturizers, face creams & cleansers. No harsh ingredients

NATURAL COSMETICS: We select effective natural ingredients & ensure our products are free of gluten, parabens, talc, artificial colors, synthetic fragrances, SLS & phthalates. We NEVER conduct animal testing.
HEALTHY BEAUTY: Mineral Fusion offers a wide range of nail polish, hair care, body care & skin care - each formulated to deliver the uniquely beneficial power of minerals. Products made in the USA.
